name: Boom! Burning Wheels
description:
A combination of racing and action... what could be better? By combining these genres, "BOOM! Burning Wheels" is able to bring maximum fun and, what is most important, to recreate the atmosphere of nostalgia for all connoisseurs of old games of the late 90s!

"BOOM! Burning Wheels" will delight you, the player, not only with an endless stream of drive from the combination of two excellent genres, but with a unique musical accompaniment, written specifically for this project in the genre of metal. Power-up effects, an extraordinary fleet full of unique vehicles, all of this is coming soon! "BOOM! Burning Wheels" allow you to plunge into the events taking place in the game, within the history of the Great Road in the era of Burning Wheels!

- 6 upgradable cars for the player;
- 4 clans of opponents;
- 60 levels to complete;
- Endless enduro mode in which you can compete with other players for the first place in the leaderboard;
- 16 biomes.
